mapper.update:
update CP_COUPON
STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRE_AT = #{expireAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STORE_WEBSITE_CRC = #{storeWebsiteCrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_NAME_CRC = #{storeNameCrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_PASS = #{isPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FINAL_WEBSITE = #{finalWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_WEBSITE = #{storeWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LINK = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_SITE_ID = #{inSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`INDEX` = #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COUPON_TYPE = #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IN_TYPE = #{inType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SITE_URL = #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_URL = #{storeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCRAPY = #{scrapy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DES = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANUAL_SORT = #{manualSort},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update CP_COUPON set STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPIRE_AT = #{expireAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STORE_WEBSITE_CRC = #{storeWebsiteCrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_NAME_CRC = #{storeNameCrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PASS = #{isPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINAL_WEBSITE = #{finalWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_WEBSITE = #{storeWebsite,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LINK = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_SITE_ID = #{inSiteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `INDEX` = #{index,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COUPON_TYPE = #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IN_TYPE = #{inType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SITE_URL = #{siteUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_URL = #{storeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCRAPY = #{scrapy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DES = #{des,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from CP_COUPON where NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STORE_ID=#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1

SELECT
FROM CP_COUPON
STORE_ID = #{storeId}
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT
FROM CP_COUPON
STORE_ID = #{storeId} AND IN_TYPE = "0"
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CP_COUPON CPCOUPON, CP_OUT_SITE_COUPON SITECOUPON ,CP_STORE STORE
CPCOUPON.ID=SITECOUPON.COUPON_ID AND CPCOUPON.STORE_ID=STORE.ID
AND SITECOUPON.OUT_SITE_ID = #{outSiteId}
AND CPCOUPON.TITLE LIKE #{name}%
mapper.update: UPDATE CP_COUPON SET MANUAL_SORT = 0 WHERE STORE_ID = #{storeId}
